pT  yield  error

1.25 0.05 0.75435 0.1252555
1.75 0.05 0.145525 0.02482521
2.25 0.05 0.0302225 0.005101853
2.75 0.05 0.00746725 0.001261577
3.25 0.05 0.0021194 0.0003761946

4.25 0.05 0.000257125 5.44444e-05
4.75 0.05 0.00010788 2.10444e-05
5.25 0.05 4.568e-05 0.90989e-05

6.25 0.05 1.02285e-05 2.66459e-06
6.75 0.05 6.21e-06 1.96375e-06
7.25 0.05 3.09873e-06 1.25483e-06
7.75 0.05 1.98745e-06 0.83518e-06


where error is (total error - pTcorr error).  This is the error we always
use as the point-by-point error in the RAA.
